data.title: Awesome Eats!
data.text: I have been living in NY for the last few years and the Mexican food there is just not the same as King Taco. Boy was I happy to get back here. We had the Asada nachos, Asada tacos, and chicken tamale. Everything was fresh and tasty. I will be in Los Angeles for a week and will be sure to get there again before I leave.

data.title: Worst Place to Eat Mexican food
data.text:
This is a very popular place and it is always packed especially on the weekends
and I CANNOT understand why! the service is terrible the food is not good and it is always crowded, first you have to stand in line for a good 30+ minutes to order your food and then another 20+ minutes in another line to pick it up.. this is a chain restaurant and very well known, food used to be good at the original King Taco but it is over rated, you'll never see me there again.

data.title: Maybe My Expectations Were Too High
data.text: Went with a couple friends to King taco for the first time. I had always heard that King Taco is "the" place.....sadly I was underwhelmed. My friend got nachos.....nacho cheese you find at the movie theater....uh, not my cup o tea.....i'm sure someone out there loves it.  The other sad thing that happened there is that it wasn't very crowded and our order took a long time.  At least the establishment was very clean and the air was cranked up 😀happy face

data.title: Not good
data.text: Ordered an asada burrito and got this tiny rice burrito never again. Burritos getting smaller and less meat.

data.title: Is there any management involved with this place.
data.text:
Every king taco has the same problem. We have now been waiting 40 minutes for our food. We could have been at a real restaurant and gotten our food already.
I'm done with king taco. Food is good but wait way too long.

data.title: Cannot Get Enough
data.text: Every time I come here, the all meat carne burrito with cilantro, onions and green sauce... it's never enough! This is always my first stop when I come to California! A little shady later at night (they even have security) but I've never felt unsafe.

data.title: Enjoy 'street tacos' than this is the place for you!
data.text: I have been enjoying King Taco as long as I can remember...its a drive for me nowadays but well worth it. Red sauce perfection spicy hot...pastor delicious carnitas tasty and not dry Horchata is grainy n tasty!  Introduced many a friend here and they always love it You won't be disappointed

data.title: get the all carne asada...
data.text: get the all carne asada burrito with onions [unless you dont like onions], sans the beans and rice.
